body: There is currently no way for player decks to be removed from Magarena.
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Add option to delete a player deck.
content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on July 28, 2014 19:26:37_

There is currently no way for player decks to be removed from Magarena.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=632_
